Package chess.logic.pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
chess.logic.pieces.Piece
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object
Represents a chess piece on the game board.
